00019 const ConstMap<std::string,int> BoostType = ConstMap<std::string,int>
00020     ("Discrete", CvBoost::DISCRETE)
00021     ("Real",     CvBoost::REAL)
00022     ("Logit",    CvBoost::LOGIT)
00023     ("Gentle",   CvBoost::GENTLE);
00024 
00026 const ConstMap<int,std::string> InvBoostType = ConstMap<int,std::string>
00027     (CvBoost::DISCRETE, "Discrete")
00028     (CvBoost::REAL,     "Real")
00029     (CvBoost::LOGIT,    "Logit")
00030     (CvBoost::GENTLE,   "Gentle");

00037 CvBoostParams getParams(vector<MxArray>::iterator it,
00038                         vector<MxArray>::iterator end)
00039 {
00040     CvBoostParams params;
00041     for (;it<end;it+=2) {
00042         string key((*it).toString());
00043         MxArray& val = *(it+1);
00044         if (key=="BoostType")
00045             params.boost_type = BoostType[val.toString()];
00046         else if (key=="WeakCount")
00047             params.weak_count = val.toInt();
00048         else if (key=="WeightTrimRate")
00049             params.weight_trim_rate = val.toDouble();
00050         else if (key=="MaxDepth")
00051             params.max_depth = val.toInt();
00052         else if (key=="UseSurrogates")
00053             params.use_surrogates = val.toBool();
00054         //else
00055         //    mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00056     }
00057     return params;
00058 }
00059 
00064 MxArray paramsToMxArray(const CvBoostParams& params)
00065 {
00066     const char* fields[] = {"BoostType", "WeakCount", "WeightTrimRate",
00067         "MaxDepth", "UseSurrogates", "MaxCategories", "MinSampleCount",
00068         "CVFolds", "Use1seRule", "TruncatePrunedTree", "RegressionAccuracy"};
00069     MxArray m(fields,11);
00070     m.set("BoostType",InvBoostType[params.boost_type]);
00071     m.set("WeakCount",params.weak_count);
00072     m.set("WeightTrimRate",params.weight_trim_rate);
00073     m.set("MaxDepth",params.max_depth);
00074     m.set("UseSurrogates",params.use_surrogates);
00075     m.set("MaxCategories",params.max_categories);
00076     m.set("MinSampleCount",params.min_sample_count);
00077     m.set("CVFolds",params.cv_folds);
00078     m.set("Use1seRule",params.use_1se_rule);
00079     m.set("TruncatePrunedTree",params.truncate_pruned_tree);
00080     m.set("RegressionAccuracy",params.regression_accuracy);
00081     return m;
00082 }

00085 
00093 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00094                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00095 {
00096     if (nlhs>1)
00097         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00098     
00099     // Determine argument format between constructor or (id,method,...)
00100     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00101     int id = 0;
00102     string method;
00103     if (nrhs==0) {
00104         // Constructor is called. Create a new object from argument
00105         obj_[++last_id] = CvBoost();
00106         plhs[0] = MxArray(last_id);
00107         return;
00108     }
00109     else if (rhs[0].isNumeric() && rhs[0].numel()==1 && nrhs>1) {
00110         id = rhs[0].toInt();
00111         method = rhs[1].toString();
00112     }
00113     else
00114         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Invalid arguments");
00115     
00116     // Big operation switch
00117     CvBoost& obj = obj_[id];
00118     if (method == "delete") {
00119         if (nrhs!=2 || nlhs!=0)
00120             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Output not assigned");
00121         obj_.erase(id);
00122     }
00123     else if (method == "clear") {
00124         if (nrhs!=2 || nlhs!=0)
00125             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00126         obj.clear();
00127     }
00128     else if (method == "load") {
00129         if (nrhs!=3 || nlhs!=0)
00130             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00131         obj.load(rhs[2].toString().c_str());
00132     }
00133     else if (method == "save") {
00134         if (nrhs!=3 || nlhs!=0)
00135             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00136         obj.save(rhs[2].toString().c_str());
00137     }
00138     else if (method == "train") {
00139         if (nrhs<4 || nlhs>1)
00140             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00141         Mat trainData(rhs[2].toMat(CV_32F));
00142         Mat responses(rhs[3].toMat(CV_32F));
00143         Mat varIdx, sampleIdx, missingMask;
00144         Mat varType(1,trainData.cols+1,CV_8U,Scalar(CV_VAR_ORDERED));
00145         varType.at<uchar>(0,trainData.cols) = CV_VAR_CATEGORICAL;
00146         CvBoostParams params = getParams(rhs.begin()+4,rhs.end());
00147         vector<float> priors;
00148         bool update=false;
00149         for (int i=4; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00150             string key(rhs[i].toString());
00151             if (key=="VarIdx")
00152                 varIdx = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_32S);
00153             else if (key=="SampleIdx")
00154                 sampleIdx = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_32S);
00155             else if (key=="VarType") {
00156                 if (rhs[i+1].isChar())
00157                     varType.at<uchar>(0,trainData.cols) = 
00158                         (rhs[i+1].toString()=="Categorical") ? 
00159                         CV_VAR_CATEGORICAL : CV_VAR_ORDERED;
00160                 else if (rhs[i+1].isNumeric())
00161                     varType = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_8U);
00162             }
00163             else if (key=="MissingMask")
00164                 missingMask = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_8U);
00165             else if (key=="Priors") {
00166                 MxArray& m = rhs[i+1];
00167                 priors.reserve(m.numel());
00168                 for (int j=0; j<m.numel(); ++j)
00169                     priors.push_back(m.at<float>(j));
00170                 params.priors = &priors[0];
00171             }
00172             else if (key=="Update")
00173                 update = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00174         }
00175         bool b = obj.train(trainData, CV_ROW_SAMPLE, responses, varIdx,
00176             sampleIdx, varType, missingMask, params, update);
00177         plhs[0] = MxArray(b);
00178     }
00179     else if (method == "predict") {
00180         if (nrhs<3 || nlhs>1)
00181             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00182         Mat samples(rhs[2].toMat(CV_32F)), missing;
00183         Range slice = Range::all();
00184         bool rawMode=false, returnSum=false;
00185         for (int i=3; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00186             string key(rhs[i].toString());
00187             if (key=="MissingMask")
00188                 missing = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_8U);
00189             else if (key=="Slice")
00190                 slice = rhs[i+1].toRange();
00191             else if (key=="RawMode")
00192                 rawMode = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00193             else if (key=="ReturnSum")
00194                 returnSum = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00195         }
00196         Mat results(samples.rows,1,CV_64F);
00197         if (missing.empty())
00198             for (int i=0; i<samples.rows; ++i)
00199                 results.at<double>(i,0) = obj.predict(samples.row(i),missing,slice,rawMode,returnSum);
00200         else
00201             for (int i=0; i<samples.rows; ++i)
00202                 results.at<double>(i,0) = obj.predict(samples.row(i),missing.row(i),slice,rawMode,returnSum);
00203         plhs[0] = MxArray(results);
00204     }
00205     else if (method == "get_params") {
00206         if (nrhs!=2 || nlhs>1)
00207             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00208         plhs[0] = paramsToMxArray(obj.get_params());
00209     }
00210     else
00211         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized operation");
00212 }
